titleStmt.title: The great oracle even the maine frame, and body of the Scriptures, resolving the question, whether in mans free-will and common grace, or in Gods speciall and effectuall grace, stands the safety of man, and the glory of God by mans safety. By F. Rous.

publicationStmt.publisher: by R.O. and G.D. for I. Bartlet at the signe of the gilt Cup, in Pauls Churchyard, neere Saint Augustins Gate,

notesStmt.note: With an imprimatur leaf on A6, signed: Johannes Hansley.
Reproduction of the original in the Lambeth Palace Library, London.

place.placeName: the signe of the gilt Cup, in Pauls Churchyard, neere Saint Augustins Gate
